question: Saluva Narasimha conquered the fertile doab comprising the districts of Mudgal and Raichur in which of the following year?
explanation: As soon as the Bijapur Sultanate was born, it was followed by incessant warfare. After Yusuf Adil Shah become the sultan of Bijapur that Saluva Narasimha conquered the fertile doab comprising the districts of Mudgal and Raichur in 1490 CE.
